info.title: Builder Prime Agent Service
info.description: Proxy server for Builder Prime API with additional validation, calendar management, and lead processing capabilities

get.description: Check the server status and health
Check if a service area exists for a given class ID, city, state, and zipcode

exists.description: Whether the service area exists for the given location

class_id.description: The class identifier that was checked

zipcode.description: The ZIP code that was checked

400.description: Bad request - missing required query parameters

error.description: Error message indicating which parameter is missing

get.description: Fetch suggested appointment time slots for a specific appointment

parameters.name: opportunityId
parameters.description: The opportunity ID to fetch time slots for

200.description: Array of suggested appointment time slots

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of leads to return

post.description: Create a simplified lead with core fields only

parameters.name: x-builder-prime-api-key
parameters.description: Builder Prime API key for authentication

get.description: Retrieve leads filtered by phone number with additional optional filters

parameters.name: x-builder-prime-api-key
parameters.description: Builder Prime API key for authentication

get.summary: Get Leads by Address and Phone
get.description: Retrieve leads filtered by both address and phone number

parameters.name: x-builder-prime-api-key
parameters.description: Builder Prime API key for authentication

post.description: Update an existing lead/opportunity record in Builder Prime API

parameters.name: x-builder-prime-api-key
parameters.description: Builder Prime API key for authentication

parameters.name: opportunityId
parameters.description: The opportunity ID of the lead to update

400.description: Bad request - validation error or API error

get.description: Get only ISO start time values for appointments

parameters.name: x-builder-prime-api-key
parameters.description: Builder Prime API key for authentication

parameters.name: opportunityId
parameters.description: The opportunity ID to get start times for

isoStartTimes.description: Array of ISO start time strings, sorted by earliest date first

post.description: Schedule an appointment using ISO start time

parameters.name: x-builder-prime-api-key
parameters.description: Builder Prime API key for authentication

400.description: No appointment found for the requested ISO start time

get.description: Get meetings from Builder Prime API. Automatically calculates date range from today to 1 month later.

parameters.name: x-builder-prime-api-key
parameters.description: Builder Prime API key for authentication

parameters.name: opportunity-id
parameters.description: Optional opportunity ID to filter meetings

parameters.name: subdomain
parameters.description: Builder Prime subdomain (defaults to 'stage' if not provided)

startDateTime.description: Meeting start date and time in UTC ISO 8601 format

get.description: Validate all required fields for lead creation
First validation check to determine if a new opportunity ID is needed

parameters.name: x-builder-prime-api-key
parameters.description: Builder Prime API key for authentication

parameters.name: opportunityId
parameters.description: Optional opportunity ID to associate with the task

post.description: Create a Retell LLM and Chat Agent with configuration

parameters.name: x-builder-prime-api-key
parameters.description: Builder Prime API key for authentication

service_label_type.description: What to call the appointment (e.g., 'In Home Consultation')

callback.description: Create task to callback at later time

price_discussion.description: Instructions for discussing pricing with customers

pricing_dialogue.description: Script or dialogue for pricing conversations

promotion_mentions.description: Information about promotions or special offers to mention

qualifications.description: Qualifications or credentials to mention (e.g., licenses, certifications)

knowledge_base_urls.description: Array of URLs to add to the knowledge base

knowledge_base_files.description: Array of file objects to add to the knowledge base

knowledge_base_texts.description: Array of text objects with text and title

post.description: Create a Retell LLM and Voice Agent with configuration

parameters.name: x-builder-prime-api-key
parameters.description: Builder Prime API key for authentication

service_label_type.description: What to call the appointment (e.g., 'In Home Consultation')

callback.description: Create task to callback at later time

services_supported.description: Comma-separated list of services included (e.g., 'windows, doors, replacements')

services_not_included.description: Comma-separated list of services excluded (e.g., 'repairs, roofs')

urls.description: Array of URLs to add to the knowledge base

knowledge_base_files.description: Array of file objects to add to the knowledge base

knowledge_base_texts.description: Array of text objects with text and title

zipcodes.description: Array of ZIP codes for service areas

post.description: Create a phone number with Retell inbound and outbound agents

area_code.description: Area code for the phone number

post.description: Import an existing phone number with Retell inbound and outbound agents

get.description: Retrieves knowledge base details by knowledge base ID

parameters.name: knowledge_base_id
parameters.description: The knowledge base ID to retrieve

post.description: Adds sources (URLs, files, or texts) to an existing knowledge base

parameters.name: knowledge_base_id
parameters.description: The knowledge base ID to add sources to

knowledge_base_urls.description: Array of URLs to add to the knowledge base

knowledge_base_files.description: Array of file objects to add to the knowledge base

title.description: Title for the text content (defaults to 'Untitled' if not provided)

knowledge_base_texts.description: Array of text objects with text and title

patch.description: Updates agent configuration settings for an existing agent by LLM ID

parameters.name: llm_id
parameters.description: Retell LLM identifier for the agent to update

service_label_type.description: What to call the appointment (e.g., 'In Home Consultation')

callback.description: Create task to callback at later time

price_discussion.description: Instructions for discussing pricing with customers

pricing_dialogue.description: Script or dialogue for pricing conversations

promotion_mentions.description: Information about promotions or special offers to mention

qualifications.description: Qualifications or credentials to mention (e.g., licenses, certifications)

get.description: Retrieves agent configuration for an agent by LLM ID

delete.description: Delete a voice agent and all its versions from Retell

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: Retell voice agent identifier to delete

delete.description: Delete a chat agent and all its versions from Retell

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: Retell chat agent identifier to delete

post.description: Push zipcodes for a company/class to define service areas

zipcodes.description: Array of ZIP code strings to add

apiKey.name: x-api-key
apiKey.description: API key for authentication (automatically set from BUILDER_PRIME_API_KEY environment variable)
